article_node.title: Clear GOP Frontrunner Emerges For Wide Open Governor Race
article_node.summary: Republican Rep. Tom Tiffany is leading in polls for the Wisconsin gubernatorial race, with 40% support among likely Republican primary voters, significantly ahead of his opponents. An endorsement from former President Trump could further solidify his position, potentially increasing his support to 60%. Tiffany's campaign is expected to focus on conservative issues, including education and transgender rights, as he prepares to announce his decision to run by the end of September.
